manifesto.title: MANIFESTO
manifesto.p1: Our mission is to allow humans to organize common projects (physical or online) in a resilient, safe, and transparent way, using radically simple tools.
manifesto.p2: We believe this world need powerful open source and decentralized tools to empower humans in their common projects. Time has come to fight back centralized platforms.
manifesto.p3: We, Samoura√Ø Coop crew, commit ourself to build sustainable tools which are made to help people to organize whatever they want, with their friends, families, and communities.
manifesto.p4: We think that an event is something that can change life, and society. As we are french, we want to remind to all that the French Revolution started with a very small group of people, discussing, voting, and creating progressively an entire movement for freedom, equality, fraternity.
manifesto.p5: Zenao is more than a simple event organization platform. It's made to allow you and your tribe to decide together what's the future of your community.
manifesto.p6: Zenao is a machine to create DAOs* in a zen philosophy, powered by
manifesto.p7: In case of emergency, keep zen, and organize.
